name: Sign Up Flow - Tourist Plan
description: This test verifies the web toursit sign up flow.

steps.name: Click join us on the homepage
Verify that the service type page has loaded correctly
Select tourist plan in the sign up flow
Verify that the tourist plan page has loaded correctly
Click on the tourist plan button
Verify that the account creation page has loaded and header / btn is displayed.
Create an account using a randomly generated email
Verify the activation method page header, instant activation / store activation cards.
Select in store activation button and navigate to payment page
Verify tourist checkout page header and cards.
